name: Cosmic Connect
description:
Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #4! Theme = CONNECT

Story: You are a defender of the galaxy in your new ship.  Pass through warp gates to connect new parts to your ship!  They increase your speed, health, and firepower!

Due to life/work I only had two days to work on it.  

Made in Unity 2D.  All sprites made  in PS CC after announcement of the theme.

Modified scripts from my previous game jam submission, and created new.

Controls: WASD movement, left/right mouse hold shoots lasers.

Music/SFX: YouTube Audio Library.

Font: Press-Start-2p by codeman38
